channel.title: Black screens when editing Black Mesa
channel.description:
Hey there, hopefully this thread is in the right spot, because I need some help :frowning: . I've added Black Mesa to my SDK to make some custom maps as I'm sure many people have, but unfortunately I am experiencing a problem with hammer.
It loads up fine, but I went to start a new map all the ports were blank and black, no grid and no response from the tools. Also in the camera window (top left) I can move around but can't select anything or at least am not getting a response from selecting anything.
Is there a fix or something for this bug? , because for lack of another word it's making it very difficult to map ...
Thanks! ![BMShammererrpr.jpg|498x280](upload://iJ52GOT8JqEMiqOkuqpN0ssZpdc.jpeg)

item.title: Black screens when editing Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
There’s a thread around here somewhere on it, but if you don’t feel like searching you could do what I did before I saw that thread;

Make a mod under the Source 2007 configuration. Name it whatever, you’re just going to delete it. Use any available option besides Source Code Only. Refresh the list by switching engines to any other build and back.
Then open the edit game configurations menu, and manually create one for BM. Delete the configuration for your temporary mod, as well as the folder structures the SDK made for it.

Open Hammer, set up the FGDs and your default preferences, and test it.
